replies.replyComment: Habeeba Ummu ai mokada  ochchara amaru.. me ratata identity ekak thiyanawa. Kage salli walin hari me rate arabiyak hadanna ba. Me rate anumatha unu adyapana kramayak thitenawa. E method ekata witharai eeta sambandha ayathana pihituwanna puliwan . Arabi culture arabi schools mehe ba.. okkotama wada meka baudda ratak . E nisa thamai muslims la kisi karadarayak nathiwA mehe inne. Arab ratakata wesak card ekk aran giyanam geniuana kenata mona weida. Ape thripitakaya aran giyanam mona weida. Me rate kawadawth katawath ehema wela na.. e thamai budu hamuduruwo ugannapu hikmeema. Muslims la un un koitharam kapa kota mara gannawada oya agamema thiyena eka eka matha walata. Meka sinhala baudda ratak.. arabi ratawala e neethiya e culture eka wage thamai mehe me rate neethiya. Me rate agama..
Anunge salli valin hodata dai iskola..ganunge garbaaetath dunnane rathanata milak.hoda margene thopita is pihiten pohosath wenna.
